HomePage.title: Your Game. Your Stage. Scan the court – start your highlights.
HomePage.description: With Élitetreplay, every rally becomes an experience. Our AI automatically detects your best moments – and edits them into professional highlight reels. Straight to your phone, ready to share. No app. No setup. Just you – and your game.

Features.headline: Experience your game – like never before.
Features.description: Élitetreplay turns your match into a professional highlight video. You play – we record, analyze, and edit automatically with cutting-edge AI.

replayWall.title: Multi-Camera Setup
replayWall.description: Our advanced multi-camera system captures every angle of your game, ensuring no moment is missed. The synchronized cameras work together to provide complete coverage and cinematic perspectives.

smartHighlight.title: Smart Highlight Creation
smartHighlight.description: Our advanced AI automatically identifies key moments in your game and creates personalized highlight reels in real-time, ensuring you never miss your best plays.

seamlessExperience.title: Seamless Experience
seamlessExperience.description: Simply scan a QR code at the court to start your recording session and receive your professional highlights instantly on your device.

instantProcessing.title: Instant Processing
instantProcessing.description: Our on-site NVIDIA Jetson Orin devices process your video locally in real-time, ensuring instant, high-quality video generation without delays or cloud dependencies.

step1.heading: Play Your Game
step1.description: Focus on what you do best – playing your heart out on the court.

step2.heading: We Capture Everything
step2.description: Our cameras and AI track all the action while you play.

step3.heading: Get Your Highlights
step3.description: Receive your personalized highlight reel instantly after the game.

step4.heading: Share & Celebrate
step4.description: Show off your skills to friends, family, coaches, and scouts.

start.title: Start in Seconds
start.description: Getting your highlights is as easy as scanning a code. No complicated setup, no waiting – just instant access to your greatest moments.

testimonial.quote: I scanned the QR code before our game, and by the time I got to the locker room, my highlights were ready to watch. My dunk looked even better than I remembered!
testimonial.author: - Jamal T., Forward

action.title: See It In Action
action.description: Experience how our AI transforms raw footage into stunning highlight reels

community.title: Community Highlights
community.description: Join thousands of players already creating unforgettable moments

partners.title: For Court Operators & Partners
partners.description: Transform your facility into a premium destination with ÉliteReplay technology

monetization.title: Monetization
monetization.description: Create new revenue streams by offering premium highlight packages to players and teams. Increase court bookings with unique value propositions.

clubBranding.title: Club Branding
clubBranding.description: Customize videos with your club's branding, logos, and colors for a professional look. Enhance your facility's reputation and marketing reach.

communityFeatures.title: Community Features
communityFeatures.description: Build a stronger community by enabling players to share their highlights on social media. Foster engagement and attract new members.

ContactPage.title: Get In Touch
ContactPage.description: Ready to transform your sports facility with AI-powered highlights? Let's discuss how ÉliteReplay can elevate your business.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.successMessage: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

recording.title: Start Recording
recording.description: Ready to capture your game at court:

session.title: Start Your Session
session.emailDescription: We'll send your highlight video to this email

courtNotFound.title: Court Not Found
courtNotFound.message: Court ID not found. Please scan the QR code again.

success.title: Session Started!
success.description: Your recording session is now running. You'll receive your highlight video shortly at {email}.
success.encouragement: Play your best game! Our AI is watching and will capture all your highlight moments.

company.title: Company Information
company.name: ÉliteReplay Inc.
company.address: 123 Innovation Drive, San Francisco, CA 94105, United States

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The information on this website is provided in good faith and for general information purposes only. We do not make any warranties about the completeness, reliability, and accuracy of this information. Any action you take upon the information on this website is strictly at your own risk, and we will not be liable for any losses and damages in connection with the use of our website.

copyright.title: Copyright Notice
copyright.text: © {year} ÉliteReplay Inc. All rights reserved. The content, design, graphics, and other materials on this website are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from any content on this website without our express written permission.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.text: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for your convenience only. We have no control over the content of these websites and accept no responsibility for them or for any loss or damage that may arise from your use of them.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to ÉliteReplay ('we,' 'our,' or 'us'). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered sports highlight service, including our website, mobile applications, and related services (collectively, the 'Service').

personal.title: 2.1 Personal Information
personal.text: We may collect the following personal information:
personal.item1: Email addresses for video delivery and communication
personal.item2: Name and contact information when you contact us
personal.item3: Payment information for premium services (processed securely by third-party providers)
personal.item4: Account information if you create an account with us

videoData.title: 2.2 Video and Image Data
videoData.text: Our service processes video recordings from sports facilities to create highlight reels. This may include:
videoData.item2: Images extracted from video for AI analysis
videoData.item3: Biometric data derived from movement analysis (anonymized)

useInformation.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
useInformation.item1: Provide and improve our AI-powered highlight generation service
useInformation.item2: Deliver personalized video content to your specified email address
useInformation.item3: Process payments and manage your account
useInformation.item4: Communicate with you about our services
useInformation.item5: Analyze usage patterns to improve our technology

dataProcessing.title: 4. Data Processing and AI Technology
dataProcessing.text: Our AI systems process video data locally on edge devices (NVIDIA Jetson Orin) installed at sports facilities. This approach ensures:
dataProcessing.item4: Automatic deletion of raw footage after highlight generation

dataSharing.title: 5. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.text: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.item1: With your consent: When you explicitly agree to share your information
dataSharing.item2: Service providers: Third-party vendors who assist in providing our services
dataSharing.item3: Sports facilities: Partner facilities may receive aggregated, anonymized analytics
dataSharing.item4: Legal requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
dataSharing.item5: Business transfers: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including: encryption in transit and at rest, secure edge computing infrastructure, regular security audits, access controls and authentication, and automatic data deletion policies.

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We retain your information as follows:
dataRetention.item1: Raw video footage: Deleted within 24 hours after processing
dataRetention.item2: Highlight videos: Stored for 90 days unless you request longer retention
dataRetention.item3: Personal information: Retained as long as necessary to provide services
dataRetention.item4: Analytics data: Anonymized and retained for service improvement

yourRights.title: 8. Your Rights
yourRights.text: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@elitereplay.com.

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.text: Our services may involve transferring your information to countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information during such transfers, in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

childrensPrivacy.title: 10. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.text: Our services are not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

policyChanges.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contactUs.title: 12. Contact Us
contactUs.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

loading.title: Loading your highlights...
loading.subtitle: This may take a few moments

notFound.title: Video Not Found
notFound.message: The highlight video you're looking for isn't available yet or may have been removed.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis Report
aiAnalysis.subtitle: Powered by ÉliteReplay's advanced computer vision technology

howItWorks.title: How Our AI Works
howItWorks.text: Our cutting-edge AI analyzes every frame to track players, detect movements, and identify standout moments. It combines object recognition, motion tracking, and highlight scoring for a tailored experience.

aiTechInfo.title: About ÉliteReplay AI
aiTechInfo.description: This highlight was crafted by our AI using edge computing. The NVIDIA Jetson Orin at the court processed the footage live, capturing key plays for your personalized reel.

subscription.title: Stay Updated
subscription.message: Get alerts for upcoming games and new highlights?

hero.title: Our AI Technology
hero.description: Explore how our innovative AI turns raw sports footage into stunning highlight reels

nvidia.title: NVIDIA Jetson Orin
nvidia.description: We leverage NVIDIA Jetson Orin edge devices deployed at sports venues. These robust AI units process video locally, eliminating the need for cloud uploads.

specs.processing: Processing: Up to 275 TOPS of AI performance
specs.memory: Memory: 64GB RAM for complex AI models
specs.connectivity: Connectivity: High-speed network for instant delivery

multiCamera.title: Multi-Camera Setup
multiCamera.description: Utilizes multiple 4K cameras placed strategically around the court to capture every perspective.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.description: High-speed SSDs store raw footage temporarily, ensuring seamless processing.

powerEfficiency.title: Power Efficiency
powerEfficiency.description: Designed for optimal energy use while maintaining top-tier AI performance.

visionModels.title: Computer Vision Models
visionModels.description: Our custom models, trained on extensive sports footage, detect players, track ball movement, and interpret game strategies.

objectDetection.title: Object Detection
objectDetection.description: Identifies and tracks players, balls, and game elements with 99.7% accuracy

actionRecognition.title: Action Recognition
actionRecognition.description: Categorizes specific sports actions like dunks, shots, or standout plays

poseEstimation.title: Pose Estimation
poseEstimation.description: Monitors player movements and postures to highlight athletic achievements

trajectoryAnalysis.title: Trajectory Analysis
trajectoryAnalysis.description: Analyzes ball paths to pinpoint successful shots and plays

highlightEngine.title: Highlight Generation Engine
highlightEngine.description: Beyond detection, our AI evaluates what defines a great highlight and crafts engaging videos automatically.

items.slowMotion: Adding slow-motion effects at key moments

realTimePipeline.title: Real-Time Processing Pipeline
realTimePipeline.description: Delivers highlights within minutes using a streamlined process.

capture.title: Video Capture
capture.description: Multiple 4K cameras record from various angles simultaneously

preProcessing.title: Pre-processing
preProcessing.description: Stabilizes and syncs footage across all camera feeds

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Analyzes footage to detect players, actions, and key moments

highlightSelection.title: Highlight Selection
highlightSelection.description: Ranks moments by excitement score and selects top highlights

autoEditing.title: Automatic Editing
autoEditing.description: Edits clips with transitions, effects, and timing adjustments

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Sends the final video to the user via the web platform

results.title: Unmatched Results
results.description: Our AI delivers outstanding performance across key metrics

demo.title: Interactive Demo
demo.description: Explore how ÉliteReplay's technology operates through these engaging demonstrations

replayWall.title: Multi-Camera Setup Visualization
replayWall.description: Our Replay Wall employs multiple synchronized cameras to capture every game angle. These cameras collaborate to ensure no action goes unnoticed.

items.lenses: Wide-angle lenses for full court coverage

items.blindSpots: No blind spots on the court

courtEnv.title: Premium Court Environment
courtEnv.description: Designed to perform in all lighting scenarios, from sunny days to dramatic night matches. Cameras adjust automatically for top-notch capture quality, ensuring professional highlights anytime. This demo features a vibrant, spotlit night court.

aiDetection.title: Real-Time AI Object Detection
aiDetection.description: Observe our AI as it identifies players, tracks the ball, and spots key moments live.

edgeProcessing.title: Edge Computing Simulation
edgeProcessing.description: Discover how our NVIDIA Jetson Orin devices process video locally for immediate results.

qrAccess.title: QR Code Access Simulation
qrAccess.description: See how effortlessly you can initiate a recording session with our QR code system.

steps.find: Find the QR code displayed at the court entrance
steps.email: Enter your email on the session page
steps.play: Play your game - we handle the rest!

qrAccess.scanMessage: Scan this QR code at the court to start your recording session
